Name: Yakumo
Reclassified:
As 1st class coast-defence ship, 1 September 1921
As training ship, 1 June 1931
As 1st class cruiser, 1 July 1942
Range: 7,000 nmi (13,000 km; 8,100 mi) at 10 knots (19 km/h; 12 mph)
Armament:
2 × twin 20.3 cm/45 Type 41 naval guns
12 × single QF 6 inch /40 naval guns
12 × single QF 12 pounder 12 cwt naval guns
8 × single QF 3 pounder Hotchkiss guns
5 × single 457 mm (18.0 in) torpedo tubes
Armor:
Waterline belt: 89–178 mm (3.5–7.0 in)
Deck: 63 mm (2.5 in)
Gun Turret: 160 mm (6.3 in)
Barbette: 152 mm (6.0 in)
Casemate: 51–152 mm (2.0–6.0 in)
Conning tower: 356 mm (14.0 in)
Bulkhead: 127 mm (5.0 in)
